author: dain
msg: Added copy of ResourceFinder to client package
Added finder based client identity resolution strategy for associating an identity token with server requests.
Added simple login methods to ClientSecurity and associated resolution strategy

author: mrglavas
msg: The SecuritySupport in javax.xml.validation and javax.xml.xpath are calling the
static getSystem* methods on the ClassLoader objects for retrieving resources. They
should be calling getResource() and getResources() so that they find all the
META-INF/services which are visible to the given ClassLoader.
